languages.text: "Ты ступил{mf||а} на опасный путь, элантах. Я вижу это — в твоих глазах, деяниях, звучании голоса и биении сердца. Покуда зачатки скверны еще можно вырвать из твоей души, не сгубив ее окончательно — отступись! Или ты заплутал{mf||а} в этом мире настолько, что жаждешь лишиться себя?"

"You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"
languages.original_text: "Ты ступил{mf||а} на опасный путь, элантах. Я вижу это — в твоих глазах, деяниях, звучании голоса и биении сердца. Покуда зачатки скверны еще можно вырвать из твоей души, не сгубив ее окончательно — отступись! Или ты заплутал{mf||а} в этом мире настолько, что жаждешь лишиться себя?"

traits.locale_text: "You have taken a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it: in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Step back while the growing corruption can still be plucked from your soul without destroying it for good! Or have you become so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

"You have taken a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it: in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Step back while the growing corruption can still be plucked from your soul without destroying it for good! Or have you become so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

"You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

"You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

"You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

"You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

languages.text: «Has emprendido una senda muy peligrosa, elantach. Lo veo en tus ojos, en tus acciones, en el sonido de tu voz, en los latidos de tu corazón. ¡Desiste, mientras la corrupción aún pueda arrancarse de tu alma sin destruirla por completo! ¿O acaso te has perdido tanto en este mundo que también tú aspiras a perder tu propia identidad?».
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

traits.locale_text: «Has emprendido una senda muy peligrosa, elantach. Lo veo en tus ojos, en tus acciones, en el sonido de tu voz, en los latidos de tu corazón. ¡Desiste, mientras la corrupción aún pueda arrancarse de tu alma sin destruirla por completo! ¿O acaso te has perdido tanto en este mundo que también tú aspiras a perder tu propia identidad?».

languages.text: “你已经踏上了危险的道路，外界人。我能从你的眼神、行为、声音和心跳中看出来。离开这条道路吧，虽然不断蔓延的腐化仍然会撕裂你的灵魂，但至少不会将它完全摧毁！还是说，你已经在这个世界里迷失太深，渴望将自己彻底托付给腐化的怀抱？”
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

traits.locale_text: “你已经踏上了危险的道路，外界人。我能从你的眼神、行为、声音和心跳中看出来。离开这条道路吧，虽然不断蔓延的腐化仍然会撕裂你的灵魂，但至少不会将它完全摧毁！还是说，你已经在这个世界里迷失太深，渴望将自己彻底托付给腐化的怀抱？”

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|engagé|engagée} sur une voie dangereuse, elantach. Je le vois dans vos yeux, dans vos actes, dans le son de votre voix, dans les battements de votre cœur. Quittez cette voie tant qu'il est encore temps de vous débarrasser de cette corruption grandissante sans anéantir votre âme ! À moins que vous soyez déjà {mf|perdu|perdue} dans ce monde au point de souhaiter oublier qui vous êtes ? »
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|engagé|engagée} sur une voie dangereuse, elantach. Je le vois dans vos yeux, dans vos actes, dans le son de votre voix, dans les battements de votre cœur. Quittez cette voie tant qu'il est encore temps de vous débarrasser de cette corruption grandissante sans anéantir votre âme ! À moins que vous soyez déjà {mf|perdu|perdue} dans ce monde au point de souhaiter oublier qui vous êtes ? »

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたは危険な道を歩み始めた。あなたの目、行動、声、心臓の鼓動を見ればわかる。腐敗が進んでいても、魂が完全に破壊されないうちは、まだこの道を去ることができる！それとも、自分自身をも擲ちたいと願うほどに、己を見失ってしまっているというのか？」
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたは危険な道を歩み始めた。あなたの目、行動、声、心臓の鼓動を見ればわかる。腐敗が進んでいても、魂が完全に破壊されないうちは、まだこの道を去ることができる！それとも、自分自身をも擲ちたいと願うほどに、己を見失ってしまっているというのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt einen gefährlichen Pfad eingeschlagen, Elantach. Ich sehe es in Euren Augen, Euren Taten, ich höre es im Klang Eurer Stimme, dem Schlagen Eures Herzens. Verlasst diesen Pfad, so lange die wachsende Verderbnis noch aus Eurer Seele gerissen werden kann, ohne diese vollständig zu zerstören! Oder seid Ihr so verloren in dieser Welt, dass Ihr auch Euch selbst verlieren wollt?"
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt einen gefährlichen Pfad eingeschlagen, Elantach. Ich sehe es in Euren Augen, Euren Taten, ich höre es im Klang Eurer Stimme, dem Schlagen Eures Herzens. Verlasst diesen Pfad, so lange die wachsende Verderbnis noch aus Eurer Seele gerissen werden kann, ohne diese vollständig zu zerstören! Oder seid Ihr so verloren in dieser Welt, dass Ihr auch Euch selbst verlieren wollt?"

languages.text: "Tehlikeli sularda yüzüyorsun elantach. Gözlerinde, eylemlerinde, ses tonunda, kalbinin atışında bunu görebiliyorum. Yüreğinde büyüyen yozlaşma seni ele geçirmeden bu yoldan dön! Yoksa bu dünyada kendini kaybedecek kadar yolunu mu şaşırdın?"
languages.original_text: "You have started down a dangerous path, elantach. I can see it in your eyes, your actions, the sound of your voice, the beating of your heart. Leave this path while the growing corruption can still be torn from your soul without completely destroying it! Or are you so lost in this world that you long to lose yourself as well?"
